modName: Lorkhan Moonlight Greatsword Project (with animated textures)
summary: Adds an beautiful stand-alone greatsword based on Dark Souls.
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]https://s25.postimg.org/jzh30a81r/Lorkhan_Moon1.png[/img]
[i][color=#00ffff]
[/color][/i][i][color=#00ffff]By FunkyGandalfCat[/color]




[img]https://s25.postimg.org/6e1g5gp1b/LorkhanMoon2.png[/img]



Legends says that the greatsword contais only a small portion of Lorkhan's power, the blade channels the very moonlight rays into it, embodying it and creating a tremendous power.

Legends also says that if an ancient sacred ritual is performed, Lorkhan will reveal himself for the one, revealing the true power of this great blade. That is, if the one is worthy of it.

[i]
 The Lorkhan Moonlight Greatsword Project is a mod which purposes are to bring one of Soulsborne weapons to Skyrim in a Lore-Friendly way.

The mod contains an epic weapon based on the famous Moonlight Greatsword from the From Software games.
The blade has an beautiful animated texture.[/i]

[size=3]The Blade posses an enchantment that ignores enemies armor and its damage will also scale with [/size][color=#00ffff]Alteration.
[/color][size=3]And when the Moons are out, the mighty greatsword will also do extra damage.[/size]

[color=#00ffff]This is my first mod, I hope you like it :)[/color]


[color=#00ffff][img]https://s25.postimg.org/j685intj3/Lorkhan_Moon9.png[/img][/color]

For manual installation:
- Just drop the data folder inside your Skyrim folder.

Or

Just use NMM and put the .esp anywhere you want in your load order.

Compability:
This mod should be compatible with everything.


[img]https://s25.postimg.org/k9k05vxa7/LorkhanMoon8.png[/img]

When it first came to my mind to create this mod, the idea was to create an epic Scripted Weapon, that would contain several powerful abilities, I want the weapon to behave exactly how Ludwig, The Holy Blade (from Bloodborne) wields his Moonlight Sword.

But I never touched an script before, so I doing my best to learn and soon bring and even more epic mod for you.

By now I wanted to upload just the blade for you to play and test.

I will glady read any suggestion, critics and opinions.

Thanks :)
